full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES GNOD PHYOGS SU BSKYAL LO, GTANG RAG GI MCHOD PA BZOD GSOL GSHEGS GSOL DKYUS LTAR BYA'O, ,BSTAN BSRUNG SPRUL BA'I CHOS SKYONGS RGYAL PO SKU LNGA BZLOG BSGYUR GYIS CHO GA GNAS KYI THOG PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DANG LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, RDO RJE 'CHANG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN MDZAD PA'I RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I GTOR TSOGS RDO RJE SGRA DBYANGS DANG BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA LAS BZHIR BYAS TE SLOB MA THA SHAL AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
